titleNullable: 3 months of Nasdaq100 related news from GDELT
descriptionNullable: This dataset was scraped from [GDELT](http://data.gdeltproject.org/events/index.html). It offers news with urls that we scraped looking for NASDAQ100 companies. Every day the scraping function is triggered as a scheduled task and retrieves news. We only show a period of 3 months. The articles are then classified by topic (Environment, Social, Governance or None) by an SGDClassifier algorithm. The sentiment is calculated using VaderSentiment.
title: 3 months of Nasdaq100 related news from GDELT
subtitle: For NLP and sentiment analysis

Every day the scraping function is triggered as a scheduled task and retrieves news. We only show a period of 3 months. The articles are then classified by topic (Environment, Social, Governance or None) by an SGDClassifier algorithm. The sentiment is calculated using VaderSentiment.
